title: Why Is the Feminine Represented as Chaos? | Q&A 06-02-2021 | Jordan B. Peterson
description:
I recently answered questions that were submitted on the social media platform - https://www.thinkspot.com. This is my third Q&A of 2021: Why Is the Feminine Represented as Chaos?

thinkspot is still in beta, and would greatly appreciate your participation. These answers were also released early on thinkspot, so if you want an earlier view of these Q&A's you can see them on thinkspot a few days early.

Some of these questions have been edited for concision and grouped together in order to answer the broader topic.

00:00 Why is the feminine represented by chaos?
9:30 cancel culture
18:08 It often seems like intelligent people lack social skills while highly social people lack intelligence
38:38 Myers Briggs personality test
51:12 Restore trust in political systems when they're proving out to be fraudulent 
59:49 How to bring back optimism in human relationships
1:01:49 I have low intelligence and feel hopeless. What sort of job should I take?
1:05:21 how can I tell if I'm being authentic or possessed by an idea?
1:13:02 Will you (Dr Peterson) and Tabby continue doing interviews together?
1:14:55 With sexuality, you said you have to ask yourself who is in control
1:21:46 Wearing masks
1:26:55 Any advice about porn and masturbation
1:28:10 Beauty and the Beast characterization 
1:33:10 why do we need to contemplate our own malevolence?
